mismatch.error: We were unable to find any RAV data based on the information provided. Please verify your personal ID and date of birth.

technical.error: Es ist ein technisches Problem aufgetreten. Versuchen Sie es später noch einmal ansonsten wenden Sie sich an unseren Support via Kontaktformular

customer.text: Please authenticate yourself using your personal ID and date of birth. Your personal ID is indicated in the letter which you received from the RAV upon registration.
customer.title: Identification

validate.pn: Please provide a number with 8 digits
validate.birthdate: The date must be between 01.01.1900 and today
